title: Easy Hawaiian Kalua Pork
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Easy Hawaiian Kalua Pork a try. This recipe makes 5 servings with 741 calories, 103g of protein, and 31g of fat each. For $3.4 per serving, this recipe covers 52% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, dairy free, fodmap friendly, and whole 30 diet. This recipe from Cheeky Kitchen has 7 fans. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. If you have head cabbage, pork butt roast, mesquite liquid smoke flavoring, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the coarse kosher salt you could follow this main course with the Salty Sweet Granolan and Coconut Yogurt {Sugar Rush Gift Edition #4} as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 95%. This score is super. Try Easy Hawaiian Kalua Pig, Hawaiian Kalua Pork, and Hawaiian Kalua Pork for similar recipes.
